channel.title: Pages on Scrollmapper Biblical Text Archive
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Scrollmapper Biblical Text Archive

item.title: About Scrollmapper
item.description: About Scrollmapper.Github.io This project is for the reading, preservation, and distribution of biblical and extra-biblical texts. It is based on two github projects: Scrollmapper Bible Databases, and the Scrollmapper Deuterocanonical Project. https://github.com/scrollmapper/bible_databases https://github.com/scrollmapper/bible_databases_deuterocanonical What is Special About Scrollmapper? This repo, like the many others on GitHub will be kept in cold storage for future generations. This is a very unique and important event. See info here: https://archiveprogram.github.com/ This event provides us with an opportunity similar to the caves of Qumran.

item.title: Index of Apocryphal and Extrabiblical Texts
item.description: 1 Enoch 2 Enoch 3 Enoch 1 Esdras 2 Esdras 1 Baruch 2 Baruch 3 Baruch 4 Baruch 1 Hermas 2 Hermas 3 Hermas The Testament of Reuben / Testaments of the Twelve Patriarchs The Testament of Simeon / Testaments of the Twelve Patriarchs
